about_the_game:
The world’s most accurate life simulator returns in Walk of Life - a No Time to Relax Adventure! You’re late for work, rent is overdue, and your refrigerator is literally on fire! Do you have what it takes to remember to eat every week? Dive headfirst into the chaotic rat race and crush your friends in Walk of Life!

Do your best to juggle your health, education, career and personal hygiene, all while dodging the hilarious curveballs life throws your way! Will you be a fry cook, a bank manager, or simply rely on the lottery for your income? Compete against friends or the AI in a series of boardgame-inspired turns to determine who’s the champion in the ultimate game of life!

The opulence! The artistry! The swag! Decorate your apartment to flex your material wealth! Nothing screams ‘success in life’ like a sleek designer couch and a weaponized robot vacuum to protect it from covetous intruders! Leave your friends in awe as you transform your apartment into a veritable Shangri-La of consumer products!

Explore new ways to approach the game! Take on one of many roles with vastly different playstyles and embark on not-so-epic quests to score some sweet bonus points! Are you going to climb the corporate ladder as the covetous CEO, or scrounge up valuable (and not-so-valuable) treasures as the scavenger?

A brand-new engine allows for all sorts of new possibilities, including improved visuals, more fluid gameplay and a slew of other modern features. This cutting-edge technology will leave your eyeballs bulging from the excitement overflowing from your brain!

Stay tuned, change the batteries in your smoke detector, and lower your expectations, because Walk of Life is coming, whether you like it or not!

name: Walk of Life
short_description: Walk of Life is a hilarious life simulator where players duke it out in the rat race of mundane living. Jaw-dropping features include getting a job, educating yourself, and buying stuff. Take on your friends or enemies in couch co-op or online and become champion in the ultimate game of life!
